data.name: YUME 2 : Sleepless Night - adult patch
data.detailed_description: This is a platform decryption game. Players need to control the protagonist to find clues in various scenes and experience the protagonist’s day
data.about_the_game: This is a platform decryption game. Players need to control the protagonist to find clues in various scenes and experience the protagonist’s day
data.short_description: This is a platform decryption game. Players need to control the protagonist to find clues in various scenes and experience the protagonist’s day

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef750
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.
All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.
